column5: Please note: This course is subject to reaccreditation status with the BABCP.This course enables you to develop your skills and qualify to practice Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT).Throughout your time on the course you will develop your understanding of CBT and the theory, research and complex issues you may have to face in a professional environment. We will help you gain the skills to support, provide care and improve the psychological wellbeing of others.You can also study this course Part
column9: 1 Year Full Time / 2 Years Part Time
